basics.name: Yi Tseng
basics.summary: Experienced Cloud Software Development Engineer with expertise in edge computing, Kubernetes orchestration, and AI/ML applications. Proven track record in developing scalable infrastructure solutions, integrating cloud services, and building intelligent applications with generative AI technologies.

work.name: Intel
work.summary: At Intel, I worked on the Platform Team providing foundational services for the Edge Manageability Framework (EMF). I developed generative AI applications for service management automation and maintained several internal clusters and critical developer services.
highlights: AWS services integration (EKS, RDS, S3, ECS, Load Balancers)
AWS EC2, IAM, Lambda infrastructure management

work.name: Open Networking Foundation
work.summary: At ONF, I collaborated with Google, Intel, and switch vendors like EdgeCore, QCT on a switch operating system called Stratum. It allows users to manage switches with P4Runtime, gNMI, and gNOI protocols. Stratum became an important part of the SD-Fabric project, which is a full-stack, programmable network fabric that enables new classes of emerging edge applications.

work.name: Open Networking Foundation/Lab
work.summary: During the internship, I work on SDN controller (ONOS), programmable data plane (P4), and next-generation mobile cloud (M-CORD).

work.name: Cyber Link
work.summary: In Quality Assurance team. My mission is to find any bugs in the product. I developed automatic testing tools by using Autoit and it helped me to complete my jobs quickly.

courses: IOC5157 - Free and Open Source Software and Project Collaboration
I4010 - Web Application Programming And Security

skills.name: Cloud & Edge Computing
keywords: AWS services (EKS, RDS, S3, ECS, Load Balancers)

skills.name: Software-defined network application design and development

projects.name: Edge Manageability Framework
projects.description: A comprehensive solution designed to streamline and enhance the deployment and management of infrastructure and applications at the edge

projects.name: GenAI Coder Service Management Agent
projects.description: An agentic application that uses custom tools to manage internal Coder service (a service that creates development environments for internal developers).

projects.name: ONOS
projects.description: Open Network Operating System (ONOS) is the leading open source SDN controller for building next-generation SDN/NFV solutions.

projects.name: SD-Fabric
projects.description: The SD-Fabric™ is is a developer-friendly, cloud-managed, full stack, programmable network fabric that enables new classes of emerging edge applications for Industry 4.0 powered by 5G.

projects.name: ONOS with Google tor.p4 demo
projects.description: The first P4 program that works on commercial hardware with integration with ONOS SDN controller and P4Runtime protocol. We showcased this at the SDN NFV World Congress and gained significant attention.
